properties.displayName: Potential Password Spraying Attempt Using Dsacls.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "/user:" and ProcessCommandLine contains "/passwd:") and (FolderPath endswith "\\dsacls.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "DSACLS.EXE")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects possible password spraying attempts using Dsacls
